name: Prestige Brands Holdings, Inc.
description: Prestige Brands Holdings, Inc. is a leading consumer products company specializing in over-the-counter healthcare and household cleaning products. Founded in 1999, the company has built a robust portfolio of brands that serve consumers' everyday needs. Prestige Brands markets a diverse range of products, including well-known brands like Clearasil, Dramamine, and Spic and Span, which cater to various consumer health and cleaning segments. The company is committed to innovation, regularly introducing new products and enhancing existing offerings to meet evolving consumer preferences. With a focus on strategic acquisitions, Prestige has expanded its brand portfolio while maintaining a strong presence in both the U.S. and international markets. The company's mission is to provide high-quality, affordable products that improve the well-being and quality of life for consumers. Additionally, Prestige Brands places a strong emphasis on corporate social responsibility, ensuring its products are manufactured sustainably and ethically. The company’s dedication to excellence has solidified its reputation as a trusted name in the consumer goods industry.
